name: GTMScripter
short_description:
GTMScripter exposes the APIs of GTMLib and TSourceLib with a scripting console.  The scripting language is JavaScript of the Rhino engine: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Rhino .

I recommend reading the Javadocs of the mentioned libraries as well as other ones you may wish to script.

Dependencies:
GTMLib and TSourceLib from the author.
PRTree, from Khelekore.
Rhino scripting engine, from Mozilla and distributed with Oracle's Java runtime.
summary: Exposes GTMLib and TSourceLib APIs with a scripting console.
